text:
Full-Stack Software Engineer | Doctible | ONSITE | Fulltime | San Diego, CA | 100k-120k

Doctible is a growth & automation platform for the healthcare industry. We make tools for healthcare practices like Dentists, Optometrists and Chiropractors that simplify their lives, help them reduce tedious manual work and make their patients happy! Weâ€™re also one of the few fast growing startups in San Diego, CA. We're looking for an experienced Full-Stack engineer that primarily deal with Rails, ReactJS and PostgreSQL in the past 5-6 years. Interview Process: Quick phone call to start, then we're interested to meet you in person to discuss interests in person. Then we will give a few technical challenges which you can complete remotely. https://www.doctible.com/careers Please send cover letter and resume to career at doctible dot com
